column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The waiting pixie is sick and tired of waiting.
Speak with the seeking pixie.
With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, enter “Beaver” to let the hiding pixie know that the game is up.
Report to the seeking pixie.
Report to the waiting pixie.
Grrr, I am so angry right now! My friends promised that we'd play together here, but not one of them have come!
Instead they're over in Anden's Airs, playing hide-and-seek! That's the only game they ever play, hmph!
I want you to march over there and give them a good scolding for me! You're respected in our village, so they'll take your words to heart!
The others are over in Anden's Airs, playing hide-and-seek! Go over there and give them a good scolding for me!

...A promise? I don't recall a─
Ahhh! We completely forgot! Oh, we're so sorry!
We would go with you right now, but we're in the midst of a game of hide-and-seek. One of us is still hiding, and we can't well leave them behind. Will you help us search?
Thank you! Now, when you find them, you must say the word “beaver.” It's the rules!
Right, let's get to it!
Our last hiding friend should be somewhere nearby. Remember, when you find them, you must say the word “beaver.” It's the rules!
Beaver

With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter “Beaver” to let the hiding pixie know that the game is up.
(Shhh! Can't you see I'm trying to hide!?)

Oh no, I am found!
...Wait, aren't you <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>!? I didn't know you were playing too! This makes it even more fun, tee hee!
Tee hee, it was so fun being found by you! You must play hide-and-seek with us again!
You did well to find our hiding friend! We would never have thought to look there!
But come, it wouldn't do to keep our waiting friend waiting any longer. They aren't the most patient of pixies.
The others finally came, thanks to you! But what's this I hear about you playing hide-and-seek with them?
That's not fair! I want to be found by you too! Promise me you'll play with us again soon!
